title: Amy Gives An Update On Her Dad & The Awesome Thing Listeners Did For His Nurse + Friday Morning Conversation With Steve Moakler
itunes:title: Amy Gives An Update On Her Dad & The Awesome Thing Listeners Did For His Nurse + Friday Morning Conversation With Steve Moakler
description:
Amy's father was supposed to have a fairly quick recovery following his surgery two weeks ago, but things have not gone as planned. She gives an update on his condition and tells us about the awesome thing listeners did for his nurse. Also, Steve Moakler stops by for today's Friday Morning Conversation. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
